newsitem.title: USA: NYC's new financing arm selects three officers.
newsitem.headline: NYC's new financing arm selects three officers.

text.p: The New York City Transitional Finance Authority at its first board meeting on Tuesday appointed three officers, who will be responsible for doing the leg-work and making recommendations to the board.
Mark Page, the deputy director/general counsel of the city's Office of Management and Budget (OMB), will serve as the Authority's executive director.
Alan Anders, the OMB's director, financing, policy and coordination, was appointed Treasurer.
And Marjorie Henning, OMB's counsel, became Secretary.
